description:
Key Responsibilities:
  • Analyze logistics and transportation data to improve efficiency.
  • Manage vendor relationships, including Amazon.
  • Support accounting functions with financial analysis and reporting.
  • Develop Excel models for data analysis.
  • Assist with 3PL and EDI system implementation.
  • Use Salesforce to manage operations and customer interactions.


Qualifications:

  • Degree in Business, Operations, Accounting, or related field preferred.
  • 1-5 years of transportation or logistics experience.
  • Strong Excel skills.
  • Experience in vendor management and accounting.
  • Knowledge of 3PL, EDI, and Salesforce is a plus.
